original_title: Peter Eisenman: University of Phoenix Stadium for the Arizona Cardinals
overview: Seminal theoretician and influential architect, Peter Eisenman is also an irrepressible sports fanatic. In this revealing look into his design for an iconic new home for the Arizona Cardinals football team, Eisenman takes us on a tour of the stadium that represents the culmination of nearly a decade of his work on this visionary sports facility.
title: Peter Eisenman: University of Phoenix Stadium for the Arizona Cardinals
